name: dread-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dark moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Dark.
short_effect: Held: Dark-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Dark.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.
